response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire our premium product, which holds significant value to us. Considering its importance and the benefits it offers, we believe it's worth $1,200,000 to you. However, to ensure mutual benefit and to maximize the value for both parties involved, we are offering you this exceptional product at a special introductory price of $1,100,000. This offer includes all the features and benefits you would expect from such a high-quality product, plus an additional year of maintenance and support services free of charge. We hope this proposal aligns well with your expectations and budget. Please let us know if you have any questions or require further information. We look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 1100000}
